column4: do someone has 3D acceleration with an ati Graphics card on Edgy?
I have a ATI Radeon X700 with 3D accell
as for me I'm using fglrx but I modified xorg.conf
do you want my xorg.conf and try to use my device and screen part?
:0, i can check my config with yours :D

I had trouble at the beginning but I use the system settings in K menu and in monitor and display I choose fglrx. When I had done a dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg it wasn't working bu t just using system settings enabled it I don't know how
add in your xorg.conf what is there : http://pastebin.ca/226654
before be sure to backup xorg.conf and restart x. Then test if 3D accell is there
omg ty, i have direct rendering :D, and glxgears give me 6520 frames in 5.0 seconds = 1303.848 FPS
now you can enjoy celestia, google earth and Beryl ;)
